Author: be_conscious
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITCONSCIOUS FOUNDATION - DECENTRALIZED CHARITY PLATFORM
Body: Dear community,  We are pleased to announce the start of BitConscious Foundation ICO! BitConscious Foundation is a decentralized charity blockchain platform that provides the sustainable and cost efficient solution to charities. We aim to change the way people contribute to charities. We have Big Plans that are to be achieved only with your support! $1 - $10 may mean nothing to you, but priceless in the view of the change the Platform aims to bring. We truly believe that a bit of consciousness shapes the future! Let’s make a difference! BTCF tokens are now available for sale at http://bitconscious.org/

Author: be_conscious
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITCONSCIOUS FOUNDATION - DECENTRALIZED CHARITY PLATFORM

I wait for my income in trading and i will invest here If I get. More power to team and more opportunity to come with this project. Goodluck.

Author: be_conscious
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITCONSCIOUS FOUNDATION - DECENTRALIZED CHARITY PLATFORM
Body: Thank you for comment.  BitConscious Foundation aims to build the Platform that will be providing a sustainable and cost efficient solution to charities through introduction of the following features: -   Transparency -   No transaction costs -   No third parties -   Instant settlements  The benefits for tokenholders include the following:  -   Investors acquiring tokens for 5 ETH (200 BTCFs) will be included in the Founders’ List and become a Co-Founder of BitConscious Foundation. -   Voting for fund allocation to individuals. Tokens held by investors represent their right to vote for Individual story they would like to allocate funds to. The Individual stories section of the Platform represents the compilation of personal stories from individuals residing in orphanage and elderly houses. BitConscious Foundation strives to introduce greater flexibility through the Individual stories program tailored to specific needs and aspirations of individuals (such as Lifesaving surgeries, Tuition fees, Medical treatment, Participation in talent contests (air tickets, hotel accommodation, transfers) etc.). Donors (any person making donation through the Platform) can review individual stories and make donations to one single pool. At the end of each month, accumulated funds will be distributed by Tokenholders, investors with tokens purchased during ICO, among particular individuals chosen through voting.

Author: TimeTeller
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITCONSCIOUS FOUNDATION - DECENTRALIZED CHARITY PLATFORM
Body: I'm just wishing that if in case this will push through, that the project will really live up to its mission. That the team behind this will implement the transparency that they promised and just get what is appropriate to them. And not using such charity activities just to make them some money out of this.

Author: be_conscious
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITCONSCIOUS FOUNDATION - DECENTRALIZED CHARITY PLATFORM
Body: The fulfillment of the mission of this project depends on success of the crowdsdale.  Each member of our team has long-standing experience in the charity sector, so we do hope for your belief in our initiative and will do our best in proving that we are indeed real professionals with transparency and ethics conduct set for ourselves as the first priority.  Additionally, we truly believe that this project will help change people's perception of the crypto community. Since unfortunately many still have cryptoworld associated with dirty money and money laundering. Our project is also aimed to show that the crypto community can benefit those in need.

Author: be_conscious
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITCONSCIOUS FOUNDATION - DECENTRALIZED CHARITY PLATFORM
Body: Thank you! The duration of our crowdsale is 31 days and will end on November 4. Good luck in trading! We are waiting for you to become our investor!

Author: leslie4u
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITCONSCIOUS FOUNDATION - DECENTRALIZED CHARITY PLATFORM
Body: Good to see such noble project surfacing around blockchain. I am sure there are many out there who needs our help and at times one stops us is the fact that people who collect money to help such charitable institutions often do not do what they say. The money thus collected is often gone to the individual pockets and the actual institution receives nothing or a very less portion of the collected money. With blockchain helping such organization will bring in transparency and authenticity for sure.  Good Luck!!

Author: be_conscious
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITCONSCIOUS FOUNDATION - DECENTRALIZED CHARITY PLATFORM
Body: Thank you! Indeed, BitConscious Foundation is aimed at ensuring greater transparency, no transaction costs, instant settlements and security of data in charity sector as well as introducing and promoting cryptoworld to the general public and thus extending the outreach of opportunities for making the world a better place.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITCONSCIOUS FOUNDATION - DECENTRALIZED CHARITY PLATFORM
Body: Thank you for the insightful comment.  As you may have noticed, we have budgeted PR specialist salaries, who will create and maintain a favorable public image in USA and European countries through television, newspapers/magazines (e.g. Forbes, Huffington Post, RBC and etc.) till May 2018.  We have also provided for SMM specialist services to promote and increase awareness within popular social media platforms (e.g. facebook, twitter, vkontakte and etc.). Hence, we believe such funds allocation to be optimal in targeting wide coverage.

Body: this project has a good and noble mission, I like the concept of transparent and without third party, this will shorten the time of transacation, but I am a little confused with the funding goal which reaches 1500 ETH, while the supply token is only 70.000 equal to 175 ETH, Who wants to explain this? thank you

Author: be_conscious
Title: [ANN] [ICO] BITCONSCIOUS FOUNDATION - DECENTRALIZED CHARITY PLATFORM
Body: Thank you for the comment. The total quantity of tokens available is 70,000 BTCFs of which 60,000 BTCFs are to be distributed and the rest of 10,000 BTCFs is to the development team (6,500 BTCFs) and bounty program (3,500 BTCFs).  1,500 ETH is calculated as follows:  1 ETH = 40 BTCFs 60,000 BTCFs/40 = 1500 ETH  We'll be glad to make any further clarifications if needed. Thank you!
